text: "The Long and Winding Road" is a 1970 song by The Beatles and taken from their 12th and final album Let It Be. It went to number 1 in Canada and the United States, number 3 in New Zealand, number 5 in Italy, number 7 in Australia and Sweden and number 8 in Belgium and Switzerland. == References == Category:The Beatles songs Category:1970 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Leo Sayer songs Category:Peter Frampton songs Category:George Michael songs
title: The Long and Winding Road
